item.title: How and Why Friends Are Unnecessary
item.description: You might be thinking that this is a really strange topic to write about, especially for my first blog post. Yet, it is very relevant during the current pandemic situation, where lots of people lack social interaction. Everyone likes having friends, making friends, interacting with friends, etc - including myself. What do I mean when I say friends are unnecessary? We will explore the answer to this question in this blog post.
